item.title: Mahila Parvekshak 2024
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> MPESB Paryavekshak Recruitment Test - 2024 (Sanchalnalay Mahila evam Bal vikash M.P. Bhopal) MPESB Paryavekshak Recruitment Test - 2024 (Sanchalnalay Mahila evam Bal vikash M.P. Bhopal) Madhya Pradesh Employee Selection Board (MPESB) Short Details of Notification MPESB Mahila_Parvekshak_2024_ADVT Recruitment Important Dates Application Begin : 09/01/2025Last Date for Apply Online : 23/01/2025Pay Exam Fee Last Date : 23/01/2025Correction Last Date : 28/01/2025Exam Date Maybe : 28/02/2025 Application Fee General / Other State : 560/-SC / ST / OBC : 310/-Pay the Exam Fee Through Cash at KIOSK Or Pay Debit Card, Credit Card, Net Banking Fee Mode Only Eligibility Age Limit : Notify SoonNotify Soon Age relaxation as per rules of MPESB Mahila_Parvekshak_2024_ADVT Recruitment.

item.title: SSC GD Constable Recruitment Exam Dates
item.description: Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has relased General Duty GD Constable Notification 2024. Those candidates who are interested in this SSC GD Constable CAPFs, NIA, SSF and Rifleman (GD) in Assam Rifles Examination,2025 can apply online from Dates 05/09/2024 to 14/10/2024. Read the SSC GD Constable 2024

item.title: Railway RRB Ministerial and Isolated Post CEN 07/2024 Apply Online for 1036 Post
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Railway Recruitment Board (Indian Railway) Railway Recruitment Board (Indian Railway) RRB Ministerial and Isolated Post Recruitment 2024 Short Details of Notification RRB CEN No. 07/2024 Application Fee General / OBC / EWS : 500/-SC / ST / EWS : 250/-Pay the Exam Fee Through Debit Card / Credit Card / Net Banking Mode. Refund Rules : General / OBC : Amount 400/- and SC / ST : 250/- Refunded After Appeared Stage I Examination.
